sentences.en: Applicants are asked to send in a CV and a covering letter.
sentences.cn: 申请人需要提交一份简历和附函。

sentences.en: Fill in the form in capital letters (= written in their large form ).
sentences.cn: 用大写字母填写表格。

sentences.en: followed instructions to the letter.
sentences.cn: 不折不扣地遵照指示

sentences.en: For a while the shock of Philippe's letter numbed her.
sentences.cn: 菲利普来信的打击让她愣了好一会儿。

sentences.en: Her letter hints of her love to (towards) me.
sentences.cn: 她的来信暗示了她对我的爱。

sentences.en: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.cn: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.en: I had a letter from Jane. She asks after you.
sentences.cn: 我收到了一封简写来的信。她向你问好。

sentences.en: I had received a letter from a very close friend.
sentences.cn: 我收到了一位非常亲近的朋友的来信。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: Nick's bank sent him a letter saying he was £100 overdrawn.
sentences.cn: 银行致函尼克，称他透支了100英镑。

sentences.en: She read out the letter to all of us.
sentences.cn: 她把那封信读给我们大家听。

sentences.en: Take your time, don't cut corners and follow instructions to the letter.
sentences.cn: 慢慢来，不要图省事，要严格按照说明去做。

sentences.en: The letter merely restated the law of the land.
sentences.cn: 这封信只不过重复了一下土地法。

sentences.en: The letter passed from one to another until everyone had read it.
sentences.cn: 这封信从一个人转手到另一个人直到每个人都看过。

sentences.en: The letter was franked in London on August 6.
sentences.cn: 这封信8月6日在伦敦盖过免费邮戳。

sentences.en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
sentences.cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

sentences.en: The Secretary's letter questions my veracity and impugns my motives.
sentences.cn: 部长的来信怀疑我的诚实，质疑我的动机。

sentences.en: The spokesman said the tone of the letter was very friendly.
sentences.cn: 发言人说信函的语气非常友好。

sentences.en: The things that stuck out were his cockiness and his four-letter words.
sentences.cn: 与众不同之处在于他的骄傲自大和满嘴脏话。

sentences.en: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.cn: 英语字母表有26个字母。

sentences.en: This little letter gave us a few chuckles, I can tell you.
sentences.cn: 说真的，我们看了这封短信都笑了。

sentences.en: While I was working on my letter the telephone rang.
sentences.cn: 我正在写信，电话铃响了。

sentences.en: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.cn: 信写好后把它装进空白信封里封好。
